ComicInfo.Title: Cause and Effect; Red Shift Rune
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cause and Effect: Noel saves a girl from some terrorists but ends up killing her when night comes and he transforms into Rune. Adam Warlock goes on a vision quest.
Red Shift Rune: Rune takes a little dimensional jaunt and observes the X-Men at their mansion.
ComicInfo.Editor: Roland Mann,Jerald DeVictoria,Hank Kanalz,Scott Bernstein,Roland Mann,Jerald DeVictoria,Hank Kanalz,Scott Bernstein
